item.title: EP 15 - So, Venus, We Meet Again
item.itunes:title: So, Venus, We Meet Again
item.description:
Today we look at a little planet that gets bullied by it’s own atmosphere, and find a man who didn’t even know he was lost.

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

The planet Venus is one of our nearby neighbors but it has always been shrouded in mystery. It has a near permanent cloud cover and varies the length of it’s days. What could cause a planet to slow down? We find out today!

The Man from Taured is a mystery from the 50’s. The story goes that a stranger appears at a Japanese airport who claimed he was from the country of Taured. The problem is this country does not exist . . .in our universe.

We also take a deeper look at daydreams and dreams in general. Why do we dream the things we do, and do we dream about ourselves or how we perceive ourselves? Fascinating!

Links:

1954, July: The Man from Taured

Why Does Venus Spin So Weirdly (Spoiler Alert: it’s a big baby.)

The Mammoth Book Of True Crime (Colin Wilson’s book that is amazing.)

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
